description:
internet is full of courses about how to make money on google adsense , some says take this course and you'll have 1000$ a month ,others say 2000 or 3000 etc...

so you are wondering if this true or not ??

but from my side i say you can make money using adsense , but the amount you make is dependant on your work not other's courses , only the thing you need is to learn the secrets for success and you have to try , so :

in this course i'm going to learn you every thing you need to become suuccessfull on youtube .

i'll teach you first : the basics that you should know

then you'll learn some of the most useful secrets on success on youtube , you should take care of the section of secrets
title: Build Your Own Business on YouTube: All Levels Course
